Plot: A confused writer goes on the search of inspiration for his next story and falls in love with a best seller author who doesn't believe in love.
Title: Happy Ending
Writer: Raj Nidimoru (story), Krishna D.K. (story), Sita Menon (story), Raj Nidimoru (screenplay), Krishna D.K. (screenplay), Sita Menon (screenplay), Hussain Dalal (dialogue)
Actors: Saif Ali Khan, Ileana D'Cruz, Kalki Koechlin, Ranvir Shorey
